mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.managecom, c.shortname AS managecomname, a.contno, a.riskcode, r.riskname AS riskcodename, a.paycount, a.agentcode, agent.name AS agentname, a.oldagentcode, oldagent.name AS oldagentname, a.salecode, sale.employeename AS salename, a.oldsalecode, oldsale.employeename AS oldsalename, a.fycrate, a.oldfycrate, a.adjustdate, a.remark, a.flag FROM lacommisionybadjust a LEFT JOIN ldcom c ON a.managecom = c.comcode LEFT JOIN lmriskapp r ON a.riskcode = r.riskcode LEFT JOIN laagent agent ON a.agentcode = agent.agentcode LEFT JOIN laagent oldagent ON a.oldagentcode = oldagent.agentcode LEFT JOIN lasaelagent sale ON a.salecode = sale.employeecode LEFT JOIN lasaelagent oldsale ON a.oldsalecode = oldsale.employeecode ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT a.id, a.contno, a.riskcode, a.managecom, a.paycount, a.agentcode, a.oldagentcode, a.salecode, a.oldsalecode, a.fycrate, a.oldfycrate, a.adjustdate, a.remark, a.flag FROM lacommisionybadjust a WHERE a.id = #{id}
